directions: In a 1 gallon pitcher, combine the mint leaves, 1 quart of boiling water, instant tea powder and sugar. Stir to dissolve sugar. Let stand for 15 minutes.
Stir in the cold water and lemonade concentrate. Serve in tall glasses over ice. Strain out mint leaves, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
title: Lemonade-Mint Iced Tea
